00030    template <class Type>
00031    class CArray2DParam : public Parameter
00032    {
00033       
00034    public:
00035   
00050       CArray2DParam(const char *label, Type* value, int m, int n);
00051   
00055       void readParam(std::istream &in);
00056   
00060       void writeParam(std::ostream &out);
00061 
00062    protected:
00063    
00065       Type* value_;
00066    
00068       int m_; 
00069 
00071       int n_; 
00072    
00073    };

00076    /*
00077    * CArray2D constructor.
00078    */
00079    template <class Type>
00080    CArray2DParam<Type>::CArray2DParam(const char* label, Type* value, int m, int n)
00081     : Parameter(label),
00082       value_(value),
00083       m_(m),
00084       n_(n)
00085    {}
00086 
00087    /*
00088    * Read CArray2DParam.
00089    */
00090    template <class Type>
00091    void CArray2DParam<Type>::readParam(std::istream &in)
00092    {
00093       if (isParamIoProcessor()) {
00094          int i, j;
00095          in >> label_;
00096          for (i = 0; i < m_; ++i) {
00097             for (j = 0; j < n_; ++j) {
00098                in >> value_[i*n_ + j];
00099             }
00100          }
00101          if (ParamComponent::echo()) {
00102             writeParam(Log::file());
00103          }
00104       }
00105       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00106          if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00107             bcast<Type>(paramCommunicator(), value_, m_*n_, 0); 
00108       #endif
00109    }
00110 
00111    /*
00112    * Write a CArray2DParam.
00113    */
00114    template <class Type>
00115    void CArray2DParam<Type>::writeParam(std::ostream &out)
00116    {
00117       Label space("");
00118       int i, j;
00119 
00120       for (i = 0; i < m_; ++i) {
00121          if (i == 0) {
00122             out << indent() << label_;
00123          } else {
00124             out << indent() << space;
00125          }
00126          for (j = 0; j < n_; ++j) {
00127             out << std::right << std::scientific 
00128                 << std::setprecision(Parameter::Precision) 
00129                 << std::setw(Parameter::Width)
00130                 << value_[i*n_ + j];
00131          }
00132          out << std::endl;
00133       }
00134    }
00135 
00136 } 
00137 #endif
